Details: 47

 Weight: 20

 Crew: 2

 The boat was built as a transport for the colonization of Laythe. It turned out simple and quite functional. It is well controlled at speeds up to 50 m / s. Max Speed = 698 m / s. All stock and without cheating.

There are subtitles.
